metadata.Title: CVE-2014-1829 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
Requests (aka python-requests) before 2.3.0 allows remote servers to obtaina netrc password by reading the Authorization header in a redirectedrequest.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-1829` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

python-requests - 2.3.0-1
python-requests-whl - 2.3.0-1
python3-requests - 2.3.0-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: requests package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.3.0-1').
